name: Investcorp Gulf Investments
overview:
Investcorp serves the best interests of the clients and shareholders by excelling in chosen field of alternative investment management.

Approximately 320 individuals at Investcorp, of more than 30 nationalities, are bound together by shared values and a common culture. Quite simply, people who work for Investcorp want to make things happen, and in this desire they succeed. Everyone at Investcorp must maintain the highest standards of professionalism, integrity and accountability.

Underpinning these qualities is an entrepreneurial spirit, a commitment to teamwork and an understanding of the value of partnership and close working relationships, inside and outside organization. The record of success in generating superior returns for clients and shareholders speaks for itself.

Investcorp is a leading provider and manager of alternative investment products, serving high-net-worth private and institutional clients.

Investcorp pursues a highly focused approach, specializing in five lines of business: private equity in North America and Western Europe, global hedge fund offerings, real estate investment in the United States, technology investment in North America and Western Europe and Gulf growth capital. The ability to provide multiple product offerings to our clients is one of key competitive strengths.
